column6: Eco-Knit Milano Stitch Oversized Shirt Jacket
column8:
Color: Black
Materials: 50% Lenzing Ecovero™, 28% polyester, 22% nylon
Softly structured feel with great stretch and recovery
Front chest pocket
Pill resistant
Lenzing Ecovero™ are viscose fibers derived from sustainable wood and pulp, coming from certified and controlled sources. It is free of harmful substances and the manufacturing cycle has been optimized to drastically reduce the environmental impact compared to traditional viscose
Factory is Higg FEM certified, which ensures they measure and quantify the sustainability impacts of their facility
Made with care in Shanghai, China
Drop shoulder, oversized fit. If you prefer a closer fit, we recommend sizing down 1 size.
Model is 5'9" and wearing a size small in black and heather grey
Model is 5'9" and wearing a size extra large in warm taupe

Take your collared look up a notch. We made this notch collar blouse with a relaxed, slim fit with a clean and crisp look for an everyday appeal. Perfectly made to be layered or worn solo. Plus, silk fiber contains 18 kinds of amino acids that make it amazing for skin nourishment, hypo-allergenic, and naturally thermoregulating to help maintain body temperature.
Crafted from 90% mulberry silk for luxe feel, and 10% spandex for a little stretch
19mm fabric weight for a premium drape and hand-feel
